notesStmt.note: Numerous folios missing after folio 27, 28, 35, 44. Imperfect at the beginning and at the end.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Two fragments of Midrash ha-gadol on Exodus.

collation.p: Quires of originally 10 leaves each. Signed with Hebrew letters on the last and the first page of a quire.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Two Yemenite semi-cursive script of late 15th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Midrash Haggadol. Exodus. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2214.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), a antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 13 December 1879: inscribed, folio [249v].
